title: 'GM Street'—Viva Las Vegas! (Ep. 90)
description:
The Ringer's Mike Lombardi and Tate Frazier huddle up to discuss the value of free-agent quarterback Colin Kaepernick (01:00), the Raiders moving to Las Vegas (09:00), first-round running backs (10:30), Adrian Peterson's future (17:00), Geno Smith and the N.Y. Giants (19:00), and Roger Goodell's return to Foxborough (21:00).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
